titles.title: Middle Class Payroll Tax Relief Act
To extend the payroll tax reduction.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/5/2013--Introduced. Middle Class Payroll Tax Relief Act - Amends the Tax Relief, Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization, and Job Creation Act of 2010 to extend through 2013 the 2% reduction in employment tax rates for employees and self-employed individuals.
